Library of MTK consumer IR interfaces. These interfaces extends the
original interface of ConsumerIrManager with functionality of IR-Learning

This library is pre-built by MediaTek internal.


WHAT IT DOES?
=============
com.mediatek.consumerirextra.jar contains Mediatek developed IR-Learning realted
functionality. Application can use these interfaces to learning IR patterns from
Infra Ray signals. 

HOW IT WAS BUILT?
==================


HOW TO USE IT?
==============
Provide api for applications to receive patterns from IR Signals. Applications
can call related interface to finish their requirement.

All the source code of this library were written by MediaTek co..
